Elon Musk - As the CEO of SpaceX and Tesla, Elon Musk is a pioneer in the fields of electric cars, renewable energy, and space exploration. Swapping places with him would allow me to gain insight into the mind of a visionary leader who is shaping the future of technology and humanity. I would learn about his approach to innovation, management, and problem-solving, as well as his vision for a sustainable future.

Malala Yousafzai - Malala is a Pakistani activist for female education and the youngest Nobel Prize laureate. Being in her shoes would give me a unique perspective on the challenges faced by girls and women in developing countries, as well as the courage and resilience required to fight for their rights. I would learn about her experiences advocating for education and equality, and how she has inspired millions of people around the world.

Lin-Manuel Miranda - Lin-Manuel Miranda is a composer, playwright, and actor known for creating the hit musical Hamilton. Swapping places with him would allow me to experience the creative process of a genius artist and learn about his approach to storytelling, music, and theater. I would gain insight into how he combines historical facts with artistic expression to create works that resonate with audiences around the world.

Greta Thunberg - Greta Thunberg is a climate activist who has become a global leader in the fight against climate change. Being in her shoes would give me a firsthand understanding of the urgency and complexity of this issue, as well as the passion and determination required to effect change. I would learn about her experiences advocating for climate action and how she has inspired millions of people to take action.

David Attenborough - David Attenborough is a British naturalist and broadcaster known for his documentaries on wildlife and the natural world. Swapping places with him would allow me to experience the world through the eyes of a master storyteller and learn about the fascinating creatures and ecosystems of our planet. I would gain insight into his approach to documentary filmmaking and how he uses his platform to raise awareness about environmental issues and the importance of conservation.
